Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Estherwood -- Sale of Gas Utility System - BOA
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Estherwood, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), sell its natural gas distribution utility system and grant franchise to operate same to CenterPoint Energy Resources Corp., d/b/a CenterPoint Energy Entex and CenterPoint Energy Louisiana Gas, as per written proposal of date January 9, 2020 on file in the office of the Clerk of said Town?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fourth Ward Drainage District No. 1 -- 6.32 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fourth Ward Drainage District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Fourth Ward Drainage District No. 1 of the Parish of Acadia, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of six and thirty-two hundredths (6.32) mills on all property subject to taxation situated in said District (an estimated $51,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for the said District?
